sentences.en: ...a government decision earlier this month to deport all illegal immigrants.
sentences.cn: …本月早些时候政府一项驱逐所有非法移民的决定。

sentences.en: Even if they didn't put her in jail, they would deport her.
sentences.cn: 即使他们不“把 ” 她关入监狱, 他们也会“把”她驱逐出境.

sentences.en: Even if they do not put her in jail, they will deport her.
sentences.cn: 即使他们不把她关入监狱, 他们也会把她驱逐出境.

sentences.en: It's important to teach a child how to deport himself in public.
sentences.cn: 教会小孩在公众场合如何举止得体十分重要.

sentences.en: She is beautiful in appearance, deport themselves gracefully.
sentences.cn: 她容貌斑斓, 举止娴雅.

sentences.en: She is declared an undesirable alien and deport.
sentences.cn: 她被宣布是不受欢迎的外国人并被驱逐出境.

sentences.en: That is the way in which we should deport ourselves.
sentences.cn: 这才是我们的行为方式.

sentences.en: The character of the book is enduring, which is the most deport crystal of human's diligence.
sentences.cn: 书籍的品质是不朽的, 是人类勤奋努力的最为持久的结晶.

sentences.en: The employers always threaten to deport us to our own country.
sentences.cn: 雇主们总是威胁要把我们遣送回国.

sentences.en: The girls in this class deport themselves gracefully.
sentences.cn: 这个班上的女孩举止娴雅.

sentences.en: The Home Office is usually quick to deport undesirables.
sentences.cn: 内政部通常会迅速地将不受欢迎人士驱逐出境。

sentences.en: We deport aliens who slip across our borders.
sentences.cn: 我们把偷渡入境的外国人驱逐出境.

sentences.en: We deport from North Point , pasted by Tsim Sha Tsui and went to Tsing Ma Bridge.
sentences.cn: 大队先由北角出发,经尖沙咀沿岸慢驶,再去青马大桥(原来由海上望,青马桥好靓架! )

sentences.en: We should deport the criminal who has entered the country illegally.
sentences.cn: 我们应该驱逐非法入境的罪犯.

sentences.en: X - ray Diagnosis of Developed Skull Fracture ( A Deport of 9 Cases )
sentences.cn: 颅骨生长性骨折的 X 线诊断 ( 附9例报告 )

trans.tran_en: to make someone leave a country and return to the country they came from, especially because they do not have a legal right to stay
